context7.description: Up-to-date library documentation lookup (no CLI alternative)

memory.description: Persistent knowledge graph for cross-session context (no CLI alternative)

playwright.description: Browser automation and E2E testing (MCP preferred over CLI)

github.description: GitHub PRs, issues, and repository operations (CLI alternative: gh)
